Uses of Package
org.jgrapes.mail.events

Packages that use org.jgrapes.mail.events
Package
Description
org.jgrapes.mail
Components for handling mail.
org.jgrapes.mail.events
Mail related events.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.mail.events used by org.jgrapes.mail
    Class
    Description
    OpenMailMonitor
    An event that opens folders on the store defined by the base class for monitoring.
    OpenMailSender
    Fired to open a connection for sending mails.
    SendMailMessage
    Indicates the arrival of a new message.
    UpdateMailFolders
    Triggers the retrieval of mails (update) by a MailMonitor.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.mail.events used by org.jgrapes.mail.events
    Class
    Description
    OpenMailConnection
    Common base class for events that open a mail connection for sending or receiving mail.
    OpenMailMonitor
    An event that opens folders on the store defined by the base class for monitoring.
    SendMailMessage
    Indicates the arrival of a new message.
